content:
It looks like your response got cut off, but I was able to recover the rest of it.

Your example resume and cover letter look great! You've effectively highlighted your certification, skills, and experience in data analysis, and tailored your application materials to the company and position. Your cover letter showcases your understanding of data analysis concepts and your enthusiasm for the role.

Remember to proofread your application materials multiple times for grammar, spelling, and formatting errors. It's also a good idea to have a friend or mentor review them as well to catch any mistakes or provide feedback.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Good luck with your application, and I hope you get an interview with the company!
